title: Just bought RP but I didnt receive it.
body: I just bought RP but I didn't receive it but I am charged for it. I relogged 3 times and I even bought a champion to look if it just needed to update, but it didnt update. Please help.

replies.body: If your transaction is showing up as pending, then it may not have gone through yet.  If your balance doesn't update in a bit, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our billing team can take a look to see what's up!
yo hmu with some rp riot.{{champion:60}}
I hope that i'll get it later on... But I don't know. And it was just 2,50! But it's still money... {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
